title: STUNNING GCD
text:
You are given three numbers N, a, b. You can build a number X by repeating N 'a' times and the number Y by repeating N 'b' times. Now that you have the numbers X and Y, determine the GCD of the two numbers X and Y.InputThe first line contains an integer T, the number of test cases.Then for each test case, there are three integers in each line:N, a, b.OutputPrint the required answer for each test case in a single line.Constraints1 ≤ T ≤ 1001 ≤ N, a, b ≤ 1018SampleInput:1
123 2 3Output:123
